item.title: Api Docs
item.description:
ðŸŽ¬ Movie App â€“ API Documentation

This document describes the API services used in the Movie App project. The app uses TMDB API and custom API service classes in Flutter (TmdbApiService and TmdbAuthService).

For more information about the Third Party here is a link

ðŸ”¹ Base URLs & Authorization

  • TMDB API Base URL: https://api.themoviedb.org/3
  • API Key: Stored in .env â†’ API_KEY
  • Authorization: Bearer token in .env â†’ ACCESS_TOKEN

Headers for authenticated requests:
